name: The Silent Field
description: These times in the world it's hard being a journalist. Taking risks just for  media to get some information. lately you got offered a job, it was the best paying job in the moment. You took that job in a heartbeat and off you went to investigate the abandoned field. numerous of disappearing happened there but you have been taking risks before in you career, so you didn't think of it too much, little did you know it would be the worst risk ever taken...
